      • trainModel

        public abstract void trainModel()
                         throws IOException,
                                UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                Exception
        This method simply trains model. Firstly the constructor should be called or model should be read from file by readModelFromFile method
        Throws:
        IOException
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        Exception

      • readModelFromFile

        public abstract void readModelFromFile(String modelPath)
                                throws Exception
        This should be exact same path as one given to saveModel
        Parameters:
        modelPath - defines location where model is stored
        Throws:
        Exception

      • saveModel

        public abstract void saveModel(String modelPath)
        This method should be given modelPath which is path to file where model should be stored. Some subclasses of this class might create more then one file by adding some suffixes to modelPath.
        Parameters:
        modelPath - defines path where model should be stored
